text: Vicente Gómez Fernández (born 9 September 1971) is a Spanish football manager, who is the manager of Azerbaijani club Sabah FC. ==Football career== Born in Santurtzi, Greater Bilbao, he was known as Vicen in his playing career as a defender. In three Segunda División B seasons for hometown club CD Santurtzi, he played 70 games and scored once in a 2–1 loss at Beasain KE on 7 February 1993. Gómez began his coaching career with minor roles at Athletic Bilbao, later becoming manager of their farm team, CD Basconia of the Tercera División. In 2014, he moved to Ukraine's FC Dynamo Kyiv and their under-19 and under-21 teams. Two years later, he was made assistant to Serhiy Rebrov, the first-team manager. After further roles as right-hand man at Al Ahli Saudi FC and FC Spartak Moscow,Spartak introduced Raúl Riancho and Vicente Gómez (Спартак представил Рауля Рианчо и Висенте Гомеса). UA-Football. 7 June 2018 on 3 September 2019 Gómez returned to Ukraine to become head coach of Olimpik Donetsk.Vicente Gómez: I am full of enthusiasm to help Olimpik to overcome this difficult period (Висенте Гомес: Я полон энтузиазма помочь Олимпику преодолеть этот сложный период). UA-Football. 2 September 2019 On 10 July 2020, Gómez was hired at Sabah FC of the Azerbaijan Premier League on a two- year contract. ==See also== * Raúl Riancho ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:People from Santurtzi Category:Spanish footballers Category:Basque footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Segunda División B players Category:CD Santurtzi players Category:Spanish football managers Category:Spanish expatriate football managers Category:Expatriate football managers in Ukraine Category:Spanish expatriate sportspeople in Ukraine Category:Expatriate football managers in Saudi Arabia Category:Spanish expatriate sportspeople in Saudi Arabia Category:Expatriate football managers in Russia Category:Spanish expatriate sportspeople in Russia Category:Expatriate football managers in Azerbaijan Category:Spanish expatriate sportspeople in Azerbaijan Category:FC Olimpik Donetsk managers Category:Ukrainian Premier League managers
title: Vicente Gómez (football manager)
